# type: 0 = Mario , 1 = Brick, 2 = Goomba, 3 = Koopas, 4 = NoCollisionObjects 5= RECT, 6=PIPE

#SECTION 1

# BRICK 
# --- platform (hint: I created the list using Excel!) ----
